name: Dice unique rules
detailed_description:
This game is a simulator of a board game. The main target of the game is to get 1000 points. A player rolls 5 bones (dice) and collects points. Look at screenshots to find out rules of the game.

The game provides:
- playing online with a computer or a real person
- regulations of the game are available inside the client ( see game official website as well )
- mouse control (except login part)
- check how lucky is your day today
- balanced rules
- Latency or ping does not influence on quality of gameplay.

- Hints:
- If your opponent has 750 and you have 0 do not be upset much, because there are 3 barrels that must to pass your opponent.


Android client: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bonesGame.online


The game is free. It is possible to play in it as much as you wish. There are 2 possible ways to play in this game. A digital or your reality (guess it is possible to make a paper copy of the rules). There is a symbolic price for the digital version and live server connection.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you are an owner of a youtube channel or you are using twitch write a letter to support email box.
(see... bones-game.online or write a email for a commercial use.)

short_description: This game is a simulator of a board game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 or higher (DirectX 9.0c or higher must be installed).
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
